subject: Fond new ultra mini speakers that plug right into the top of the RS 469
author: bhali333
full_text:
hey guy's these speakers are about three inches long. they are not very 
powerfull but get the job done, they take 2 aaa batteries to run and 
plug right into the top of th RS 12-469. I bought them at a burlington 
coat factory for 4.99

I will try to find them on line and post the url.
there is a pic in the photo section in the Bruce folder.

Bruce
